Trinity::
She slowly came out of stasis lock and started to wake up. She opened 
her eyes and saw lazar fire and bots standing over her pod.  She 
stood up on all four of her kitten legs and growled a kitten growl.  
She called out in a small voice,"HEY! Let me out. Come on, open this 
thing up."  she got mad and scratched at the top of the pod.  The 
opening mechanism was dammaged in the crash and wouldn' open 
automatically. "LET ME OUT! Come on you guys, let me out. This isn't 
funny any more. Let me out." She pawed at the glass and growled again.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Tarantulas and Aerostreak gave up on the old pod, and quickly 
relocated 
> to Trinity's pod. They entered jsut when the DNA scanners had 
activated.
>     "Quickly! In a few moments it will be to late!" Tarantulas 
hissed, 
> rushing over and ripping open the control panle. He unhooked 
several wires, 
> placed the ever important Predacon chip in place of the Maximal 
chip, and 
> seal the control panle back up. His fastest record yet.
>     Aerostreak looked around. "So, is it a Predacon?" He didnt like 
be so far 
> away from the ship, and the others.
>     "Yes Aerostreak. When the bot emerges it will be a Predacon!" 
He laughed 
> with Aaerostreak, until a fimiliar rumbeling broke there happiness.
>     "I know that buzz.....oh no...." Tarantulas said, as he looked 
up to see 
> Hell Beast and Gremlin. They were armed, and pissed off.
>     "Ah, Tarantulas, thank you for saving me the trouble of 
reprogramming 
> that pod! Drop your wepons now, or be destroyed!" He barked at 
them, floating 
> a few feet above the pod. Gremlin approached and looked down apon 
the pod. 
> "Its clear."
>     "Excellent. Now we wait until the bot emerges. In the mean 
time, I wish 
> you two to give a message to Black Aracnia for me." He said with a 
sly smile.
>     "And what would that be?" Aerostreak tried to say bravely.
>     Hell Beast shot two missles at the Predacons from his shoulder 
canons, 
> sending the two flying out of sight deeper into the forest. He then 
gave his 
> attention to the pod.
>     "I have had enough of Black Aracnia. I need to find 
Megatron.....the 
> tables have turned, and he is the one holding all of the cards now."
> 
>     Megatron cursed his incompetent Maximal counterparts. Aquarious 
and 
> Nighteyes failed to give him what he wanted, and Terrorsaur was 
still 
> missing. On top of that, Kitkat was getting closer to the truth. 
>     (And yes, Logo, you are right on the Remote Control thing.)
>     "Cant you idiots do anything right?Argh! Get out of my sight 
before I 
> send you both to the scrap pile!" He roared in fustration. The 
destruction of 
> the Autobots seemed to be getting harder and harder......but 
prehaps a covert 
> spy within the Cybertronian Fire would prove useful...
>     "Ah yes....a spy. Nighteyes, I have a new mission for you." He 
said, and 
> then gave a bellowing laugh.
